Name: Trivia Vault: Health Trivia Deluxe
About the game: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Health Trivia Deluxe and bring your thinking hat. Answer medical and health trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value. Correct answers lock in the digit code for the vault, 10 correct answers cracks the vault and awards bonus cash. Track your progress and aim for higher scores to accomplish higher ranks. Challenge yourself to beat your high score by playing multiple times and completing all 100 levels with a total of 1000 unique trivia questions in this deluxe edition. Features: 100 Vaults to Crack(levels) 1000 Unique Trivia Questions Timer Based Questions Obtain Cash Multipliers Based on Correct Answers in a Level 3 Ranks of Accomplishment per Level
